::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod saw the incoming missile, and dodged it. In his attempt to
dodge, he ran right in to the three plasma shots.
"Aaaaarrrrggg!" The wounds hurt like hell, but there was nothing to do
but drive, so he kept on going.
He reversed his rocket launchers, and shot back at Punch, and Counter
Punch.
